title: How to insert a micro SD card into an LG Stylo 5 - Quora

response.answer_text: How do I insert a micro SD card into an LG Stylo 5? In the box your phone comes with will be a flat usually silver tool for opening the SD card draw, stick the small end of that in the wee hole below the volume keys and the draw will pop open, the rest is obvious. The draw will open for a paperclip or similar if you have lost the tool.
